<template>
    <!-- <main class="wrapper">
        <div class="card-container"> -->
            <!-- <ProductCard
                v-for="(product, index) in inventory.slice(0,6)"
                :key="product.id"
                :index="index"
                :product="product"
                :addToCart="addToCart"
                class="card">
            </ProductCard> -->
       
                  <ProductCard
                      v-for="(product, index) in inventory.slice(0,6)"
                      :key="product.id"
                      :index="index"
                      :product="product"
                      :addToCart="addToCart"
                      class="card">
                </ProductCard>

</template>
<script>
import ProductCard from '@/components/ProductCard.vue'
export default {
  props: ['inventory', 'addToCart'],
  components: {
    ProductCard
  }
}
</script>
